title: "Summary by CDM Table"
author: "Meera Y. Patel, MD"
date: "12/21/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(pg13)
```

```{r}
conn <- local_connect("polyester")
```

## PERSON  

```{r}  
output <- summarize_table(conn = conn, 
                           schema = 'omop_cdm', 
                           table = 'PERSON')
```

```{r}
output %>% 
        purrr::map(as.data.frame) %>%
        purrr::map(as_tibble) 
```
